parameter.name: Avoid border crossing
parameter.description: Avoid crossing a border into another country

parameter.name: Avoid 4WD roads
parameter.description: Avoid roads only suitable for 4WD only vehicles

parameter.name: Allow private access
parameter.description: Allow access to private areas for cars

parameter.name: Allow private access (truck)
parameter.description: Allow access to private areas for trucks

parameter.name: Goods vehicles restrictions
parameter.description: Consider access permissions for light goods vehicles (goods)

parameter.name: Hazmat category
parameter.description: Hazardous materials category / Consider hazmat access permissions

parameter.name: HazMat 5. Oxidizing agents and organic peroxides
parameter.description: HazMat 5. Oxidizing agents and organic peroxides

parameter.name: Weight
parameter.description: Maximum vehicle weight to be permitted on the route

parameter.name: Height
parameter.description: Maximum vehicle height to be permitted on the route

parameter.name: Length
parameter.description: Maximum vehicle length to be permitted on the route

parameter.name: Width
parameter.description: Maximum vehicle width to be permitted on the route

parameter.name: Max axle load
parameter.description: Maximum legal load weight limit per axle

parameter.name: Max weight at full load
parameter.description: Maximum permitted weight of the vehicle at full load

parameter.name: Avoid border crossing
parameter.description: Avoid crossing a border into another country

parameter.name: Avoid sett
parameter.description: Streets and paths which are paved with sett are avoided quite strictly (they are already avoided in standard mode).

parameter.name: Avoid cobblestone
parameter.description: Streets and paths which are paved with cobblestone are avoided quite strictly (they are already avoided in standard mode).

parameter.name: Use elevation data
parameter.description: Use terrain elevation data provided by SRTM, ASTER and EU-DEM

parameter.name: Use elevation data
parameter.description: Use terrain elevation data provided by SRTM, ASTER and EU-DEM

parameter.name: Expressly permitted streets
parameter.description: Only use Streets which are expressly permitted

parameter.name: Expressly permitted ways
parameter.description: Only use ways (tracks, paths aso.) which are expressly permitted

parameter.name: Use elevation data
parameter.description: Use terrain elevation data provided by SRTM, ASTER and EU-DEM

parameter.name: Carriage restrictions
parameter.description: Consider access permissions for horse-drawn vehicles

parameter.name: Height
parameter.description: Maximum vehicle height to be permitted on the route

parameter.name: Width
parameter.description: Maximum vehicle width to be permitted on the route

parameter.name: Alpine/downhill ski
parameter.description: Slopes for alpine or downhill skiing and access to ski lifts.

parameter.name: Cross country/nordic ski
parameter.description: Trails for nordic or cross-country skiing.

parameter.name: Allow intermediate routes
parameter.description: More difficult routes with steeper sections. Generally some obstacles that should be avoided.

parameter.name: Allow advanced routes
parameter.description: Difficult routes, with dangerous obstacles and steep sections.

parameter.name: Allow expert routes
parameter.description: Extremely difficult routes, with dangerous obstacles and surroundings.

parameter.name: Allow skating only routes
parameter.description: Routes groomed for free style or skating only without classic trails.

parameter.name: Allow classic only routes
parameter.description: Routes groomed for classic style only without skating trails. This includes routes groomed by a smaller snowmobile with looser piste and tracks made manually by skiers.

parameter.name: Prefered difficulty
parameter.description: Prefer routes of this difficulty, although routing over harder or easier pistes is still possible if shorter.

parameter.name: Off-piste
parameter.description: Freerides and offpiste are unofficial routes and passages. Typically ungroomed, unmainted by the officials and not checked in the evening. Enter at own risk.
parameter.valueDescriptions: Do not go offpiste,Only if necessary,Allow,Prefer offpiste
